system.notes:
Opponents with the Daemonic Trait suffer -10 to attack tests and Focus Power tests against the wearer.
Only available to those must trusted by the Ordo Malleus. [AP: 55%]

description.value: Opponents with the Daemonic Trait suffer -10 to attack tests and Focus Power tests against the wearer. Only available to those must trusted by the Ordo Malleus.
